resources.string: I haven\'t added in optional ads yet. This is more of a practice thing for myself and the app will continue to be ad-free!

To access this feature you must purchase the premium upgrade. This upgrade unlocks:
-220+ quotes and five additional characters.
-20+ notification sound effects. 
-A skip button for days when you need a little more ATLA in your life.

Hi! Just wanted to let everyone know that as of the most recent Daily Iroh update, you can (optionally) get quotes from other characters. I\'ve put a lot of time and effort into this app and I want to sincerely thank everyone that uses it! Have a great day!
